      • loadLevel

        private void loadLevel(int level)
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Loads the level from the database.
        Parameters:
        level - ID of the level into the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query fails
        java.io.IOException - if the image of a sprite doesn't exist
